DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety of Miglitol in patients with Type2 Diabetes Mellitus with treated insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Double-Blind Trial of Miglitol in Type 2 Diabetic Patients With Insulin Treatment
DOC.criteria: Type2 diabetes Criteria of postprandial plasma glucose and HbA1c are met Type1 diabetes Patients with antidiabetic drugs The other exclusion criteria are met
